Hello, my name is Hubert.

I'm a 20 years old programmer from Poland. I live in Szczecin and I'm currently studying Computer Science at West Pomeranian University of Technology. Programming is my greatest passion since childhood. At that time I dreamed of becoming a game developer.

This dream resulted in going to IT studies and passion for life. I'm fluent in making responsive websites from scratch as well as connecting them to backend with PHP or Node.js. I have great designing skills and I look at every UI/UX detail.

Most of my free time I spend on learning new technologies and working on my projects. Most of my work is available on GitHub .

Outside of programming, I'm keen on movies, history and MBTI typology. I'm also collecting watches and books.
